# OUD Model <img src='figs/logo.jpg' align="right" height="139" />
<!-- <img src="figs/logo.jpg" align="center" alt="" width="360" /> -->

[`OUD-Model`](https://github.com/benenns/OUD-Model) is an R package with necessary code and data to run a semi-Markov cohort model to evaluate interventions for people with opioid use disorders.

The development of the OUD model is detailed in the following manuscripts:

OPTIMA CEA

OPTIMA Prelim

Variations of the OUD model have been used in previous manuscripts:

Xnational

NAOMI
